Method Detail

isFederated

boolean isFederated()
Return true if the plugin is a "federated" plugin (i.e., calls through to other plugin instances).

init

boolean init(ServletContext context)
Called by the Plugin Factory once the class is loaded. Here the plug-in can perform some of its initialization checks. This method returns true if all goes well.

Parameters:
context - the servlet context, useful for getting information about other registered plugins (will be added to the context.attribute by name).
Returns:
true if initialization succeeds

doSearch

boolean doSearch(SearchContainer search_container)
The entry point of the Search Plugin. Every adapter will call this method.

Parameters:
search_container - the Search Container object to use for the search

close

void close()
Called by the Plugin Factory once the class is deleted from the Tomcat context. Here the plug-in can perform its closing tasks.

isRequestValid

boolean isRequestValid(SearchRequest request)
Check the basic existence of required request parameters. Note: this method does not catch exceptions.

Parameters:
request - the search request
Returns:
true if sufficient search request parameters are present in the request.

getDefaultPreferences

PluginPreferences getDefaultPreferences(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> overrides)
Parameters:
overrides - a set of overrides (key value pairs)
Returns:
the default preferences with overrides applied
